name: Cell Defence
description:
You control an immune system in Cell Defence and must protect the body against Bacteria and Virus infected cells. You can produce 5 different types of white blood cells. You cannot control the white blood cells, they will do their best to fight off the infection.

This is the KBGames Stranding Jam version. The game is not fully finished, but should be playable enough. The game won't end when you run out of health, but you can use the health bar as an indicator of how you're doing.

With a big of luck and good use of your resources, maybe you'll be able to stave of the infection.
